ComicInfo.Summary:
The Army has intensified its search for Julie Martin, and the scientists at HeNRI warn it's only a matter of time before the liquid metal remnants of the Beta Suit she's wearing explode with the power of a hydrogen bomb. Running for her life, Julie desperately seeks a way to remove the metal, only now she faces a new problem: the metal is growing. The Beta Suit is regenerating!
Dillon and Annie learn that the suit contains Annie's DNA. they discuss what to do while Ivy receives a phone call with bad news about her daughter that speeds up her agenda.
Even with her quarry in sight Ivy cant bring herself to use potentially lethal force to end the situation and decides to go home instead for a few days at least.
Julie find s out that Pam is missing and assumes its the government. Actually she has gone to her former home believing she still lives there. the new owner expresses her sorrow for her loss and when Pam finds the house changed she panics and goes to find Julie.
Dan arrives at HENRI as Jack tries to cover up the trail of destruction.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 14:41:29. [CVDB162531]
ComicInfo.Characters: Dillon Murphy, Ivy M. Raven, Julie Martin, Pamela Mitchell
